graphql.query:
mutation($name: String!,
    $status : String,
    $attachments : JSON,
    $free_support : JSON,
    $fee_support : JSON,
    $categories : JSON,
    $demo_link : String,
    $price : Float,
    $sale_price : Float) {
    create_dev_project(input: {
        name: $name,
    status : $status,
    attachments : $attachments,
    free_support : $free_support,
    fee_support : $fee_support,
    categories : $categories,
    demo_link : $demo_link,
    price : $price,
    sale_price : $sale_price
    }) {
    id
    name
  }
}

mutation(
    $id:ID!
    $name: String!,
    $status : String,
    $attachments : JSON,
    $free_support : JSON,
    $fee_support : JSON,
    $categories : JSON,
    $demo_link : String,
    $price : Float,
    $sale_price : Float) {
    edit_dev_project(input: {
        id:$id,
        name: $name,
    status : $status,
    attachments : $attachments,
    free_support : $free_support,
    fee_support : $fee_support,
    categories : $categories,
    demo_link : $demo_link,
    price : $price,
    sale_price : $sale_price
    }) {
    id
    name
  }
}
